project.name: C-C682B-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C682B-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Read a hex integer from the input. If hexinteger is negative, ignore. If hexinteger < 0x0000FFFF, do nothing. If hexinteger >= 0x0000FFFF try to zero-out the upper two bytes using char pointers. Perform an incorrect calculation, and rather than zero-ing out the upper two bytes, zero out two different bytes, which corrupts pointers on the stack and results in a seg fault.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
